name: Fiery Bombardment
originalText: Chroma {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Fiery Bombardment deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of red mana symbols in the sacrificed creature's mana cost.

rulings.text: Chroma abilities check only mana costs, which are found in a card’s upper right corner. They don’t count mana symbols that appear in a card’s text box.
Chroma abilities count hybrid mana symbols of the appropriate color. For example, a card with mana cost {3}{U/R}{U/R} has two red mana symbols in its mana cost.

text: Chroma — {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Fiery Bombardment deals damage to any target equal to the number of red mana symbols in the sacrificed creature's mana cost.
